colorScheme.type: whiteAlpha / blackAlpha / gray / red / orange / yellow / green / teal / blue / cyan / purple / pink
colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

getInitials.description: Function to get the initials to display
getInitials.description_zh: 获取要显示的首字母的函数

icon.description:
The default avatar used as fallback when `name`, and `src`
is not specified.
icon.description_zh:
当 'name' 和 'src' 时用作后备的默认头像
未指定。

ignoreFallback.description:
If `true`, opt out of the avatar's `fallback` logic and
renders the `img` at all times.
ignoreFallback.description_zh:
如果为“true”，则选择退出头像的“fallback”逻辑，并且
始终呈现 'img'。

name.description:
The name of the person in the avatar.

- if `src` has loaded, the name will be used as the `alt` attribute of the `img`
- If `src` is not loaded, the name will be used to create the initials
name.description_zh:
头像中人员的姓名。

- 如果 'src' 已加载，则名称将用作 'img' 的 'alt' 属性
- 如果未加载 'src'，则名称将用于创建首字母缩写

onError.description: Function called when image failed to load
onError.description_zh: 图像加载失败时调用的函数

referrerPolicy.description: Defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.
referrerPolicy.description_zh: 定义在获取资源时发送哪个反向链接。

showBorder.description:
If `true`, the `Avatar` will show a border around it.

Best for a group of avatars
showBorder.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则 'Avatar' 将在其周围显示边框。

最适合一组头像

size.type: 2xs / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / 2xl / full

srcSet.description: List of sources to use for different screen resolutions
srcSet.description_zh: 用于不同屏幕分辨率的源列表
